attributes.action: Declare the EU referendum result invalid due to propagation of untruths by Leave
attributes.additional_details: Check out Susannah Reid's interview with Nigel Farage, in which he admits the £350 million a week claim is untrue.
attributes.background: Many voters voted Leave on the grounds that leaving the EU would free up £350 million per week to spend on the NHS. This was a lie, as admitted by prominent Leave campaigners after the result. Therefore the basis on which the Leave campaign won the referendum is invalid
